text: Shaun Micallef's Stairway to Heaven is an Australian television factual series on SBS, starring comedian and writer Shaun Micallef. ==Episodes== The series first screened as a documentary in 2015 titled "Gods, Gurus and the Ganges". It returned on 18 January 2017 as a 3-part series with episodes titled "Mormons", "Spiritual Healing" and "Armageddon". ==References== ==External links== * *Artemis Films Category:2015 Australian television series debuts Category:Special Broadcasting Service original programming Category:Australian comedy television series
title: Shaun Micallef's Stairway to Heaven
